welcome_message: Welcome to your internationalized React app!
hero_description: At Mimic, we specialize in crafting bespoke digital solutions tailored to elevate your brand's online presence and engage your audience effectively. Let's connect.

portfolio_title_plain: Portfolio - Explore unique ideas brought to life
workflow_title_plain_v2: How it works - Our streamlined workflow
workflow_subtitle_v2: Our workflow makes it simple and easy to work the best possible together.
workflow_step_1_description_v2: We start by understanding your vision, goals, and requirements to lay a solid foundation.
workflow_step_2_description_v2: Our team develops a comprehensive strategy and project plan tailored to your specific needs.
workflow_step_3_description_v2: We create stunning designs and write clean, efficient code to bring your ideas to life.
workflow_step_4_description_v2: Rigorous testing ensures a flawless product before we deliver the final solution and provide support.
techStack_description: We leverage industry-leading tools to streamline workflows and ensure the perfect product for you.
testimonials_description: Discover what satisfied clients have to say about their experience with our service solutions.
testimonial_1_text: Mimic's team have been wonderful. They revamped our site to a pixel perfection. They are well experienced and organized team.
testimonial_2_text: We shared a Figma design of our new home website, they are reaaally good at what they do. They know everything about marketing and software skills. Really happy with the results!
testimonial_3_text: We have worked with Mimic team several times, they are an impecable team, really dynamic and understanding in each project. Every result is pixel perfect.
about_seo_description: Innovation starts with imitation. We use this principle to craft digital solutions that transform ideas into unique digital experiences.
about_hero_title: At Mimic, we believe that all species, including humans, begin by mimicking
about_hero_description: Whether it's learning to walk or creating art. We use this principle to craft digital solutions that transform ideas into unique digital experiences.
team_description: Every detail counts, we believe in our team whom stands out for our clients.
about_hero_section_description: In a fast paced world, take action. Lets build together!
about_hero_section_discover_services: Discover the complete suite of services we offer, empowering you to build your dream product.
services_seo_description: UX UI Design, Website and E-commerce solutions, Consulting, AI and Tailored solutions.
services_hero_title: We are characterized as Thinkers and Doers
services_hero_description: We transform ideas into unique digital experiences through innovative design and strategic thinking.

services_website_ecommerce_description: Building powerful solutions in Wordpress, Webflow, Framer, Squarespace, and Shopify.
services_ai_solutions_description: AI Agents, Copilots, automations and much more. The sky is the limit.
services_tailored_solutions_description: Personalized Apps, CRMs, ERPs designed to fit your unique needs.
services_consulting_description: With our broad expertise, we focus in serving as your Fractional CTO.
disclaimer_content_1: All brands, logos, and trademarks displayed on this website (mimic.agency) are the property of their respective owners. Mimic Agency does not claim any ownership over these brands, nor do we use them for commercial purposes beyond showcasing our design and development expertise. Our intent is solely to highlight our work, and we do not alter or misrepresent the original identity or values of any brand.
disclaimer_content_2: Additionally, some projects displayed in our portfolio may have been modified after delivery by the client or may include design variations for presentation purposes. As such, the final outcome of a project may differ from what is shown on this site.
disclaimer_content_3: If you are the owner of a brand featured here and have any concerns, please contact us at hi@mimic.agency.
privacy_policy_section_1_content: Mimic Agency ("we", "our", or "us"), a brand operated by A Better World Ventures LLC, uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on mimic.agency ("Website") to enhance user experience, analyze site traffic, and improve our services. By continuing to use our Website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.
privacy_policy_section_2_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us recognize your device, remember preferences, and provide a better browsing experience.
privacy_policy_section_3_content_1: • Essential Cookies: Necessary for core website functions (e.g., security, login, language settings).
privacy_policy_section_3_content_2: • Analytics Cookies: Help us analyze site traffic and optimize performance (e.g., Google Analytics).
privacy_policy_section_3_content_3: • Marketing Cookies: Used for personalized advertising and retargeting (if applicable).
privacy_policy_section_3_content_4: • Functionality Cookies: Improve user experience by remembering preferences.
privacy_policy_section_4_content: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect the Website's functionality.
privacy_policy_section_5_content: We may use third-party services (e.g., analytics providers) that place cookies on your device. We do not control these cookies.
privacy_policy_section_6_content: We may modify this Cookies Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated date.
privacy_policy_section_7_content: For any questions, please contact us at hi@mimic.agency.
cookie_policy_section_1_content: Mimic Agency ("we", "our", or "us"), operated by A Better World Ventures LLC, values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit mimic.agency ("Website").
cookie_policy_section_2_content_1: We may collect the following types of data:
cookie_policy_section_2_content_2: • Personal Information: Name, email, phone number, company details (if provided via forms or email).
cookie_policy_section_2_content_3: • Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device data, and usage behavior (collected via cookies and analytics tools).
cookie_policy_section_2_content_4: • Communication Data: Any inquiries or messages you send to us.
cookie_policy_section_3_content_3: • Respond to inquiries and communicate with you.
cookie_policy_section_3_content_4: • Analyze website performance and optimize user experience.
cookie_policy_section_4_content_1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your data. However, we may share it with:
cookie_policy_section_4_content_2: • Service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics tools) to assist our operations.
cookie_policy_section_4_content_3: • Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights.
cookie_policy_section_5_content: We implement security measures to protect your data. However, no Internet transmission is completely secure.
cookie_policy_section_6_content_1: Depending on your location, you may have rights to:
cookie_policy_section_6_content_2: • Access, correct, or delete your data.
cookie_policy_section_7_content: Our Website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.
cookie_policy_section_8_content: We may modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated date.
cookie_policy_section_9_content: For privacy concerns, please reach out to hi@mimic.agency.

description_AI_Solutions: AI chats, automations, Agents, workflows and much more. The sky is the limit
latest_tools_IA: Some of the latest tools we use to craft your AI  solution
AI_automations_description: Automate repetitive tasks with smart AI.
AI_agents_description: Deploy autonomous agents to handle complex workflows.
AI_analytics_description: Gain insights from your data with predictive analytics.
description_UX/UI_Designs: Crafting user-friendly and visually stunning interfaces.
latest_tools_UXUI: Some of the latest tools we use to craft your design
UXUI_AboutSection_text: Visual design is more than just aesthetics — it’s the foundation of how users connect with your brand. A strong UX/UI ensures every interaction feels effortless, intuitive, and engaging. It builds trust, communicates value instantly, and keeps users coming back.
UXUI_AboutSection_text2: Great design transforms ideas into experiences that convert, retain, and delight. Whether it’s a website, app, or platform, thoughtful UX/UI is what turns functionality into a product people love to use.
AI_AboutSection_text: We help you harness the power of artificial intelligence to automate, optimize, and scale. From custom chatbots and predictive systems to AI-driven content and workflows, our solutions are tailored to solve real business problems. We turn complex technologies into practical tools that make your operations smarter, faster, and more efficient.
UX_Research_description: We define the right experience through user research, personas, and journey mapping — ensuring every design decision is grounded in real user needs and business goals.
UI_Kit_description: We design clean, modern, and responsive interfaces that align with your brand and delight users — from moodboards to pixel-perfect, high-fidelity screens.
Special_projects_description: We deliver developer-ready files, specs, and style guides — and support your team through handoff to ensure a seamless transition from design to code.

seo.title: Portfolio: Our work
seo.description: Meet our unique digital products we've crafted for our amazing clients.

description_Website_Ecommerce_Solutions: Building powerful solutions in Wordpress, Webflow, Framer, Squarespace, and Shopify.
latest_tools_Website_Ecommerce: Some of the latest tools we use to craft your new website or E-commerce solution
WebsiteEcommerceAboutSection_text: We craft modern, responsive websites and powerful e-commerce platforms that drive growth and enhance user experience. Whether you need a simple landing page, a robust online store, or a custom web presence, we combine design, functionality, and performance to help you connect with your audience and convert visitors into loyal customers.
description_Tailored_Solutions: Personalized Apps, CRMs, ERPs designed to fit your unique needs.
latest_tools_Tailored: Personalized Apps, CRMs, ERPs designed to fit your unique needs.Some of the latest tools we use to craft your desired tailored software solution
TailoredAboutSection_text: Building powerful solutions in Wordpress, Webflow, Framer, Squarespace, and Shopify.
latest_tools_Tailored_Solutions: Some of the latest tools we use to craft your desired tailored software solution
TS_AboutSection_title: If you think it, we build it
TS_AboutSection_text: Every business has unique challenges—and we build software that fits like a glove. Whether it’s a custom CRM, an internal dashboard, a mobile app, or a fully integrated platform, we develop solutions based on your exact needs. Using no-code, low-code, or full-code stacks, we bring agility and precision to your product development.
CRM_description: Manage customer relationships, sales, and support in one streamlined platform.
ERP_description: Integrate business processes like finance, inventory, and operations seamlessly.
Apps_description: Custom web and mobile apps designed for performance and scale.
Other_tailored_solutions_description: Custom web and mobile apps designed for performance and scale.
description_Consulting: With our broad expertise, we focus in serving as your Fractional CTO.
Consulting_AboutSection_title: Our expertise sets a new horizon
Consulting_AboutSection_text: We offer strategic consulting to help you launch, grow, or transform your digital business. With expertise across product, technology, marketing, and operations, we act as your partners in innovation—bringing clarity to your vision and momentum to your execution. Whether you’re building from scratch or scaling fast, we help you make smarter moves.
Concept_creation_description: Shape innovative ideas into clear, validated, and strategic product visions.
UX_UI_description: Design intuitive, engaging digital interfaces focused on user experience success.
Product_management_description: Align teams, roadmap, and priorities to deliver valuable, market-ready products.
Team_building_description: Assemble high-performing teams tailored to your tech and growth goals.
Technology_description: Choose the right tools and technologies to build a product that meets your needs and scales with your business.
Budget_optimization_description: Optimize your budget for maximum impact and efficiency.
